content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 89.3 - Continuation of eligibility for certain benefits

State Regulations
(a) An employee who is absent and receiving
payments pursuant to this Part shall be deemed to be in full pay status for the
purpose of Civil Service Law and the rules and regulations promulgated
thereunder. (b) An employee subject
to this Part who is absent on workers' compensation disability leave without
pay resulting from an injury or disease suffered on or after January 1, 1994
shall be deemed to be in full pay status for all other purposes of the Civil

Service Law and the rules and regulations promulgated thereunder, but only for
one cumulative year of absence for each such injury or disease. Notes
